email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 06/26/2000 04:17 PM --------------------------- Steve List <slist@Campbell.com> on 06/26/2000 12:32:02 PM To: "'jarnold@enron.com'" <jarnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: FW: trading > -----Original Message----- > From: Steve List > Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 1:26 PM > To: 'jarnol1@ect.enron.com' > Subject: trading > > > John, > > I hope all is well down in Houston, though it would seem your baseball > team is, well, terrible. > We may be close to resolving our internal issues as our CEO indicated on > Friday. We are awaiting some > confirmation but it seems we are close. How is the credit standing for > Enron? > Is there a chance of upgrade or well, you can tell me the status. > > Thanks > > Steve List
